description.value:
Cost: 0 AcP

If you are at least trained in Nature, you gain a bonus skill feat from the following list: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Natural Medicine], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Quick Identification], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Recognize Spell], or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Train Animal]. If you have already selected one of these feats, you can freely retrain your selection.
